Definition:
Writing an false answer to the conferred question bases on the related fact. You are also provided with the correct response to the given question. Make sure that your fallacious answers is relevant and comparable to the related fact.  Apart attempting to make the incorrect answering analogue to the correct answer so that distinguishing correct answers from the erroneous respond is not very easily.
Things to avoidance: Make persuaded you don't involuntarily provide another correct replying! Apart make sure they sound reasonable (e.g., presumably be on a tuition pop questionnaire).
Focusing & Caveat: una good untrue replying can be build utilize phrase associated with the question, but not the rightness responses. During example, for the question "Whar aided plant survive?", utilize words iike "weed", "vase", "honeybee" (related with "plant"), or "first supporting", "parachute", "accidents" (linked with "outlive") etc. in your faulty answers makes the question strenuous, so these consequence in good incorect responded.
